title: T206 Minor League per T206 Resource
author: toledo_mudhen

posts.post_title: T206 Minor League per T206 Resource
posts.post_content:
Trying to determine how many cards make up the subset of T206 Minor League Cards.

When I select the listing for "Minor League" in T206 Resource it shows that subset as consisting of 134 Cards.

However, approximately 50 of those 134 cards listed are designated as "Southern" League.

So are the Southern League cards also part of the Minor League Subset or do they stand alone as their own subset?

Thanks for any clarification you can provide.
There are 48 southern Leaguers.  They are also minor Leaguers.  If this helps.

Both
The SLers are their own subset and they are collected as part of the Minor League subset

[quote name="toledo_mudhen" post=2507930]Trying to determine how many cards make up the subset of T206 Minor League Cards.[/QUOTE]

Correct there are 134 minor leaguers, broken down:

48 Southern League
86 non-SL
The small checklist/price guide/catalog from 1978 breaks them down by league.
